summary: Iteration 38 Complete - Large batch of changes tested: UTC→Local time display, Search aggregator integration, Dashboard filter/sort, Briefing transcript panel, Tools page, Google OAuth button, Mobile responsive. All 7 feature categories tested successfully.

issues: Tour modal appears on every page load even on error pages, may need to check tour_seen state persistence

critical_code_review_comments: PASS: Clock.js uses toLocaleTimeString - displays local time correctly
PASS: LandingPage header shows 'LOCAL: <Clock />' - verified visible
PASS: AuthPage header shows 'LOCAL <Clock />' - verified visible
PASS: ForgotPasswordPage header shows 'LOCAL <Clock />' - verified visible
PASS: NotFoundPage shows 'TIMESTAMP_LOCAL' with local time - verified
PASS: ServerErrorPage shows 'TIMESTAMP_LOCAL' with local time - verified
PASS: Search endpoint /api/search?source_type=aggregator returns only aggregator results
PASS: Search endpoint returns source_type field (rss/aggregator/podcast) in results
PASS: SearchPage has filter buttons: ALL, RSS, AGGREGATOR, PODCAST (data-testid verified)
PASS: SearchPage has sort buttons: LATEST, RELEVANCE (data-testid verified)
PASS: DashboardPage has filter tabs: ALL, RSS, AGG (data-testid='filter-all/rss/aggregators')
PASS: DashboardPage has sort button toggling NEW/OLD (data-testid='sort-btn')
PASS: MorningBriefingPage has TRANSCRIPT panel on right (data-testid='transcript-panel') - desktop only
PASS: MorningBriefingPage has archive toggle (data-testid='archive-toggle') - mobile only
PASS: MorningBriefingPage has SFX toggle (data-testid='sfx-toggle')
PASS: ToolsPage exists at /tools with all 6 categories: CORE_STACK, AI_SERVICES, NEWS_AGGREGATION, AUDIO_ENGINE, AUTH_AND_STORAGE, INFRASTRUCTURE
PASS: LandingPage footer has 'TOOLS_AND_STACK' link pointing to /tools
PASS: AuthPage has 'CONTINUE WITH GOOGLE' button (data-testid='google-auth-btn')
PASS: Mobile dashboard at 375px shows filter tabs without overflow
PASS: Mobile briefing at 375px shows archive toggle
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page OR set localStorage.setItem('narvo_guest', 'true')
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 38 tested: 1) UTC→Local time - Clock component uses toLocaleTimeString, all pages show LOCAL not UTC. 2) Search aggregator - /api/search?source_type=aggregator works, SearchPage has ALL/RSS/AGGREGATOR/PODCAST filter buttons and LATEST/RELEVANCE sort. 3) Dashboard filter/sort - filter-all/rss/aggregators tabs and sort-btn toggle NEW/OLD work. 4) Briefing transcript - right column transcript-panel on desktop, archive-toggle on mobile, sfx-toggle present. 5) Tools page - /tools exists with 6 categories, footer link works. 6) Google OAuth - google-auth-btn present with 'CONTINUE WITH GOOGLE'. 7) Mobile responsive - 375px shows filter tabs without overflow on dashboard/search, archive toggle on briefing.

utc_to_local_time.notes: Clock.js uses toLocaleTimeString. Landing/Auth/ForgotPassword show 'LOCAL'. NotFound/ServerError show 'TIMESTAMP_LOCAL'.

search_aggregator_integration.notes: GET /api/search?q=Nigeria returns 22 results with source_type field. GET /api/search?source_type=aggregator filters correctly. SearchPage has ALL/RSS/AGGREGATOR/PODCAST buttons and LATEST/RELEVANCE sort.

dashboard_filter_sort.notes: Dashboard header has filter-all/filter-rss/filter-aggregators tabs and sort-btn that toggles NEW/OLD.

briefing_transcript.notes: Desktop shows transcript-panel on right with actual transcript text and line count. Mobile shows archive-toggle. SFX toggle present.

tools_page.notes: /tools page exists with CORE_STACK, AI_SERVICES, NEWS_AGGREGATION, AUDIO_ENGINE, AUTH_AND_STORAGE, INFRASTRUCTURE categories. Footer link works.

google_oauth_button.notes: google-auth-btn present on /auth page with 'CONTINUE WITH GOOGLE' text. NOTE: OAuth requires Supabase provider config.

mobile_responsive.notes: Dashboard at 375px shows filter tabs without overflow. Briefing at 375px shows archive toggle. Mobile navigation bar visible.

mocked_apis.factcheck_service: MOCK fallback when Google Fact Check API key not set
mocked_apis.google_oauth: Button exists but requires Supabase Google provider configuration
